item.title: Debian install 2
item.description: After many days of configuration, I finally complete the installation of my perfect “workstation” ;). source.list I have to directory for this, first the preferences, then the sources.list. Just run an aptitude update, and you will some missing gpg keys, now run apt-key adv --recv-keys --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com <key_number> To have your keys installed. sudo A sudo file is important in order to correctly manage a computer, a simple aptitude install sudo will give you the tool.
